135 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
136 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateModel() const
137 {
138  Q_ASSERT(BaseClass::IsGuiCreated());
139 
140  i2d::CPolygon* objectPtr = GetObjectPtr();
141  Q_ASSERT(objectPtr != NULL);
142 
143  int count = NodeParamsTable->rowCount();
144 
145  i2d::CPolygon polygon;
146 
147  for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
148  double x = NodeParamsTable->item(i, CI_X)->text().toDouble();
149  double y = NodeParamsTable->item(i, CI_Y)->text().toDouble();
150 
151  polygon.InsertNode(i2d::CVector2d(x, y));
152  }
153 
154  if (!objectPtr->IsEqual(polygon)){
155  istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(objectPtr);
156 
157  objectPtr->CopyFrom(polygon);
158  }
159 }
160

164 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
165 QTableWidget* TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::GetNodeTable()
166 {
167  return NodeParamsTable;
168 }

171 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
172 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnInsertNode()
173 {
174  iqt::CSignalBlocker block(NodeParamsTable);
175 
176  int row = NodeParamsTable->currentRow();
177  if (row < 0){
178  row = NodeParamsTable->rowCount();
179 
180  NodeParamsTable->setRowCount(row + 1);
181  }
182  else{
183  NodeParamsTable->insertRow(row);
184  }
185 
186  NodeParamsTable->setItem(row, CI_X, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(0)));
187  NodeParamsTable->setItem(row, CI_Y, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(0)));
188  NodeParamsTable->setCurrentCell(row, 0);
189 
190  DoUpdateModel();
191 }
192 
193 
194 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
195 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnCopyData()
196 {
197  PolygonBasedModel* objectPtr = dynamic_cast<PolygonBasedModel*>(GetObjectPtr());
198  if (objectPtr == NULL){
199  return;
200  }
201 
202  iser::CMemoryWriteArchive archive;
203 
204  if (objectPtr->Serialize(archive)){
205  QByteArray data((const char*)archive.GetBuffer(), archive.GetBufferSize());
206 
207  QMimeData* dataPtr = new QMimeData();
208  dataPtr->setData(typeid (PolygonBasedModel).name(), data);
209 
210  QApplication::clipboard()->setMimeData(dataPtr);
211  }
212 }
213 
214 
215 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
216 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnPasteData()
217 {
218  PolygonBasedModel* objectPtr = dynamic_cast<PolygonBasedModel*>(GetObjectPtr());
219  if (objectPtr == NULL){
220  return;
221  }
222 
223  const QMimeData* dataPtr = QApplication::clipboard()->mimeData();
224  if (dataPtr != NULL){
225  if (dataPtr->hasFormat(typeid (PolygonBasedModel).name())){
226  QByteArray data(dataPtr->data(typeid (PolygonBasedModel).name()));
227 
228  iser::CMemoryReadArchive archive(data.data(), data.size());
229 
230  objectPtr->Serialize(archive);
231  }
232  }
233 }

236 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
237 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnRemoveNode()
238 {
239  int row = NodeParamsTable->currentRow();
240  if (row >= 0){
241  iqt::CSignalBlocker block(NodeParamsTable);
242 
243  NodeParamsTable->removeRow(row);
244 
245  DoUpdateModel();
246  }
247 }

255  BaseClass::OnGuiModelAttached();
256 
257  QObject::connect(NodeParamsTable, SIGNAL(cellChanged(int, int)), this, SLOT(OnParamsChanged()));
258 
259  UpdateToolsMenuButton();
260 }

274 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
275 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateGui(int /*updateFlags*/)
276 {
277  Q_ASSERT(BaseClass::IsGuiCreated());
278 
279  i2d::CPolygon* objectPtr = GetObjectPtr();
280  if (objectPtr != NULL){
281  NodeParamsTable->clearContents();
282 
283  int count = objectPtr->GetNodesCount();
284  NodeParamsTable->setRowCount(count);
285 
286  for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
287  i2d::CVector2d coord = objectPtr->GetNode(i);
288  NodeParamsTable->setItem(i, 0, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(coord.GetX())));
289  NodeParamsTable->setItem(i, 1, new QTableWidgetItem(QString::number(coord.GetY())));
290  }
291  }
292 }

297 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
298 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnGuiCreated()
299 {
300  BaseClass::OnGuiCreated();
301 
302 #if QT_VERSION < 0x050000
303  NodeParamsTable->horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::Stretch);
304 #else
305  NodeParamsTable->horizontalHeader()->setSectionResizeMode(QHeaderView::Stretch);
306 #endif
307 
308  CPolygonParamsGuiItemDelegate* columnDelegate = new CPolygonParamsGuiItemDelegate();
309  NodeParamsTable->setItemDelegateForColumn(0, columnDelegate);
310  NodeParamsTable->setItemDelegateForColumn(1, columnDelegate);
311 
312  BaseClass::CloseLineCheckBox->setHidden(true);
313  UpdateToolsMenuButton();
314 }

316 
317 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
318 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::UpdateToolsMenuButton()
319 {
320  BaseClass::ToolsButton->setHidden(true);
321  i2d::CPolyline* polylinePtr = dynamic_cast<i2d::CPolyline*>(BaseClass::GetModelPtr());
322  i2d::CPolygon* polygonPtr = dynamic_cast<i2d::CPolygon*>(BaseClass::GetModelPtr());
323 
324  if (polylinePtr != NULL || polygonPtr != NULL){
325  BaseClass::ToolsButton->setHidden(false);
326  if (BaseClass::ToolsButton->menu() == NULL){
327  BaseClass::ToolsButton->setMenu(new QMenu(BaseClass::ToolsButton));
328  BaseClass::connect(BaseClass::ToolsButton->menu(), SIGNAL(triggered(QAction*)),
329  this, SLOT(OnToolsButtonMenuActionTriggered(QAction*)));
330  }
331 
332  QMenu& menu = *BaseClass::ToolsButton->menu();
333  menu.clear();
334 
335  menu.addAction(QIcon(":/Icons/FlipHorizontal.svg"), tr("Flip horizontally"))->setData(ActionFlipHorizontally);
336  menu.addAction(QIcon(":/Icons/FlipVertical.svg"), tr("Flip vertically"))->setData(ActionFlipVertically);
337  menu.addAction(QIcon(":/Icons/RotateRight.svg"), tr("Rotate clockwise"))->setData(ActionRotateClockwise);
338  menu.addAction(QIcon(":/Icons/RotateLeft.svg"), tr("Rotate counterclockwise"))->setData(ActionRotateCounterclockwise);
339  if (polylinePtr != NULL){
340  menu.addAction(QIcon(":/Icons/Reverse.svg"), tr("Reverse line"))->setData(ActionReverseLine);
341  }
342  }
343 }
344 
345 
346 template <class PolygonBasedShape, class PolygonBasedModel>
347 void TPolygonBasedParamsGuiComp<PolygonBasedShape, PolygonBasedModel>::OnToolsButtonMenuActionTriggered(QAction* action)
348 {
349  i2d::CPolygon* polygonPtr = dynamic_cast<i2d::CPolygon*>(BaseClass::GetModelPtr());
350  if (polygonPtr != NULL){
351  istd::CChangeNotifier notifier(polygonPtr);
352 
353  i2d::CVector2d center = polygonPtr->GetCenter();
354  int count = polygonPtr->GetNodesCount();
355 
356  switch (action->data().toInt()){
357  case ActionFlipHorizontally:
358  for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
359  i2d::CVector2d node = polygonPtr->GetNode(i);
360  node.SetX(center.GetX() + (center.GetX() - node.GetX()));
361  polygonPtr->SetNode(i, node);
362  }
363  break;
364 
365  case ActionFlipVertically:
366  for (int i = 0; i < count; i++){
367  i2d::CVector2d node = polygonPtr->GetNode(i);
368  node.SetY(center.GetY() + (center.GetY() - node.GetY()));
369  polygonPtr->SetNode(i, node);
370  }
371  break;
372 
373  case ActionRotateClockwise:
374  {
375  i2d::CAffineTransformation2d translateTo00;
376  translateTo00.Reset(-center);
377  i2d::CAffineTransformation2d rotate;
378  rotate.Reset(i2d::CVector2d(0, 0), M_PI / 2);
379  i2d::CAffineTransformation2d translateBackToCenter;
380  translateBackToCenter.Reset(center);
381  polygonPtr->Transform(translateTo00);
382  polygonPtr->Transform(rotate);
383  polygonPtr->Transform(translateBackToCenter);
384  }
385  break;
386 
387  case ActionRotateCounterclockwise:
388  {
389  i2d::CAffineTransformation2d translateTo00;
390  translateTo00.Reset(-center);
391  i2d::CAffineTransformation2d rotate;
392  rotate.Reset(i2d::CVector2d(0, 0), -M_PI / 2);
393  i2d::CAffineTransformation2d translateBackToCenter;
394  translateBackToCenter.Reset(center);
395  polygonPtr->Transform(translateTo00);
396  polygonPtr->Transform(rotate);
397  polygonPtr->Transform(translateBackToCenter);
398  }
399  break;
400 
401  case ActionReverseLine:
402  for (int i = 0; i < count / 2; i++){
403  i2d::CVector2d node1 = polygonPtr->GetNode(i);
404  i2d::CVector2d node2 = polygonPtr->GetNode(count - 1 - i);
405  polygonPtr->SetNode(i, node2);
406  polygonPtr->SetNode(count - 1 - i, node1);
407  }
408  break;
409 
410  default: break;
411  }
412  }
413 }
